mapper.select:
select cu.user_id userId, cu.user_account userAccount, ca.receiver userName, cvac.area area, cu.create_at createAt, opu.total commonPartner, bpu.total commonUser from czb_user cu left outer join czb_vip_recharge_records cvrr on cvrr.user_id = cu.user_id left outer join czb_vip_area_config cvac on cvac.vip_area_config_id = cvrr.vip_area_config_id left join czb_address ca ON cu.user_id = ca.user_id left outer join (select czb_user.first_level_partner,count(1) total from czb_user where partner = 1 and first_level_partner != '' and first_level_partner is not null group by first_level_partner) opu on opu.first_level_partner = cu.user_id left outer join (select czb_user.first_level_partner,count(1) total from czb_user where partner = 0 and first_level_partner != '' and first_level_partner is not null group by first_level_partner) bpu on bpu.first_level_partner = cu.user_id where partner = 2
AND cu.user_account like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
AND cu.create_at BETWEEN #{createAt} AND DATE_ADD(#{createAt},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND cvac.area like concat('%',#{area},'%')
